hymn.title: God is processed, this I know

layout.singingstanza: God is pro -- cessed, this I know, For the Bi -- ble tells me so. In -- car -- nat -- ed as a man, Lived and died and raised a -- gain. Yes, God is pro -- cessed, Now He's the Spir -- it To con -- sti -- tute us With the pro -- cessed Tri -- une God.

lyrics.stanza: God is processed, this I know, For the Bible tells me so. Incarnated as a man, Lived and died and raised again.
Yes, God is processed, Now He's the Spirit To constitute us With the processed Triune God.
Incarnation: mingled makes, Crucifixion: terminates, Resurrection: germinates, Life divine now animates.
Incarnated so He can Have the living of a man. Crucified and raised that He Could impart His life to me.
